section.title: Overview
section.p: This is a collection of notes to assist with certain project planning and to co-ordinate development. When the development work is complete, then these docs can be removed because all of the content will have moved into the documentation proper.
Refer to the Issue Tracker for further specific information. Try to keep these notes, and the issues, as concise as possible.

section.title: Ongoing major development topics
